meanings.sent1: There are a numerable amount of apples in the basket.
meanings.sent2: The numerable students in the class made it easy to take attendance.
meanings.sent3: The numerable stars in the sky twinkled like tiny diamonds.
meanings.sent4: Her numerable achievements shone brightly on her resume.
meanings.sent5: The numerable petals on the flower created a beautiful pattern.

meanings.sent1: The numerable cookies on the plate tempted the children.
meanings.sent2: The numerable pages in the book made it seem longer than it was.
meanings.sent3: The numerable toys in the store delighted the young boy.
meanings.sent4: His numerable mistakes in the game cost his team the victory.
meanings.sent5: The numerable birds in the tree chirped a cheerful melody.

meanings.sent1: The numerable houses on the street were all painted different colors.
meanings.sent2: The numerable questions on the test challenged the students.
meanings.sent3: The numerable socks in the drawer seemed to disappear mysteriously.
meanings.sent4: His numerable talents made him a valuable asset to the team.
meanings.sent5: The numerable waves crashing on the shore created a soothing sound.
